website_summaries.verdict: The Ryka Nell was highly commended for its comfort and style. Purchasers were also delighted that it came in different width profiles. Its lightweight nature and durability were also appreciated. However, the construction of the collar was greatly criticized along with the loose fit. But in the end, it came highly recommended for those looking for a stylish and comfortable walking shoe.
pros: A majority of the reviewers found the Ryka Nell to be very comfortable for long periods of use
Many buyers raved about the doll-shoe style and subdued colorways because they went well with various clothing ensembles
The size and width of this model were considered true to the brand’s measurement scheme by multiple users
More than a few testers were pleased that this product was very lightweight
Despite the lack of a closure system, the upper was deemed supportive by several people
Some individuals lauded the upper material because it was perceived to be durable though it was soft
cons: A significant number of critics ranted about the stretchy collar because it tended to become too restrictive and the back portion and rubbed the Achilles raw
The fit of the footgear was deemed too wide that a minority of shoppers had to return their pair because it kept falling off their feet
The upper material irked a few folks because it was too stiff and caused discomfort

customer_reviews.title: The elastic is too right.
customer_reviews.text: Size wise these fit fine. I wear size 7. I bought size 7. Cute. Lightweight. Here are the 2 issues: 1) the back starts rubbing almost immediately and 2) the elastic at the top pushes down too much and start feeling uncomfortable after just a few minutes. I wore these for about 30 minutes at home sitting down and these shoes had to come off because of the elastic. Too bad I have to return them because the style is nice. I think these would look good with lots of outfits. Gray color is nice as well. Which is why I gave these 3 stars instead of just 1.
customer_reviews.author: Masha

customer_reviews.title: PROBLEM FEET?  TRY THESE..YOU WILL BE HAPPY.
customer_reviews.text: Considering my feet are wide and I have bunions, these shoes are quite comfy, good support, and look very nice for casual dress. I have three pair in these colors, tan, gray, and the black.
customer_reviews.author: Cottage Lady

customer_reviews.title: My Go-to shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Ryka is my go to brand for comfortable well fitting casual footwear. I find that I need a half size smaller in slip ons than the lace up sneakers for that great fit, though.. BTW the shoes are blue. The only pink in the innersole.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E.

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Very comfortable and I wear them all the time. They help reduce fatigue and pain I feel whan I wear my other shoes that have orthotics in them. For some reason, ll Ryka shoes I have worn are "perfect" for me. And they have such cute styles. I'm going to have to invest in stocks if they are available. Lol. Will definitely buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Behling

customer_reviews.title: Not typical Ryka comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka shoes but these were awful. The sole was so hard it felt like walking on wooden blocks. Immediately made my feet hurt after a few steps. Zero cushion, not sure how these would be construed as walking shoes. Sent back
customer_reviews.author: E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cramps my toes!
customer_reviews.text: The front of the shoe slopes so much that there wasn't enough room for more big toe. Although the footbed was looking g enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ginna

customer_reviews.title: try smaller size.
customer_reviews.text: i bought this shoe first in size 7w which I normally wear for walking sneaker with socks. . very big, and way too wide. went to 6.5 m which was great. although heel may feel a bit stiff initially, i wore both ;pairs very comfortably on a trip.with light sock liners.and little previous wear.
customer_reviews.author: caseyo

customer_reviews.title: Ryka Shoes - Different Styles...
customer_reviews.text: All of the Ryka shoes styles fit differently even if they are ordered in the same size. I have ordered at least 6 pair, but had to send half back because they did not fit me comfortably. The Ryka shoes I did keep are pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen Salazar

customer_reviews.title: They were comfortable until they started rubbing the skin off the backs ...
customer_reviews.text: They were comfortable until they started rubbing the skin off the backs of my heels. I went up a size even though they’re stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Smalls9

customer_reviews.title: cuteshoe
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately the shoes I received were sized differently, One was just right the other to short. Don't think my feet are that mismatched. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Golfer girl

customer_reviews.title: Ryka brand is terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Ryka brand. I have a few pairs and these are great! Very versatile shoe. These are comfortable for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: modern grammy

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers/shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these and get lost of complements on them! They are comfortable and look nice enough to wear with most things. Even with “bad feet” I can wear theses all day.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and the light weight. It has a sturdy rubber sold and flexes perfectly with each stride. This is my second pair from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Sayre

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! For well, as expected. Stylish, sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Becky L. Haaf

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, comfortable shoes and they look very attractive. I'm glad I purchased them. They are just right for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Thielen

customer_reviews.title: Drop 1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read the reviews about sizing. I wear an 8.5 in Ryka tennis shoes but took the advice of many to go down a half size. I ordered an 8. Heel still slips a little but that's normal for me. I haven't worn yet, other than around the house to try on, but they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have a bunion and hammertoe and these are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Way to go Ryka
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfie! I desperately needed wide slip-ons and these fit perfectly. I bought a pair in each color, except for the taupe. I love how they give you extra height as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this shoe. My only potential problem can be Is that I downsized by 1/2 size and my heel stays nicely in the shoe when I walk but I do feel my big toe touching the tone of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: We are going to Disney World in 3 weeks and thought these shoes would be great for the trip. They are very lightweight and are quite comfortable. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Portland

customer_reviews.title: Terrific shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are terrific, and I say that as a die-hard Skechers fan! They fit well, look great, and have been super comfortable from day one! Will definitely buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Joan P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: A nice and lightweight walking shoe. Did have a tendency to slip off my heel but I think that’s just my problem and not the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Missmiss

customer_reviews.title: product runs a l;ittle large
customer_reviews.text: loved the color wish could have gotten this in a 6.5W
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love Ryka and love these shoes. Usually a 9..went with a 8.5. Comfortable and good looking
customer_reviews.author: Tazmania

customer_reviews.title: Not flexible.
customer_reviews.text: Way to stiff & made walking difficult. I have a similar pair & they are very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The length is fine but when you walk your toes go deep into the front of the shoe and it squishes your toes... Then your heel pops out. They fit very weird
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Run small - and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka generally, and from the photos, I expected a comfortable supportive shoe. For me, it ran very small. Even though I tried a size larger, the shoe was surprisingly hard and uncomfortable. Too bad!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe needs to feel comfortable always for me.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the material the shoe is made of. Very hard on the foot not soft sock material unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: margaret pena

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable for walking or wearing around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Fogg

customer_reviews.title: 3 pair and counting
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought 3 pairs of the same shoes before, until these. My first pair was from an outdoor store that had them for $15 so I thought why not try. After wearing the first pair I was hooked and bought 2 more colors. They give you a little height but don’t make you feel unstable in walking. I have wore these shoes nonstop all summer for work.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: It has a raised floor bed.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was similar to walking in a gym shoe. The heel of the shoe is raised up, so if you have back problems & don’t walk in heels, do not get these shoes. They are cute, but run big.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Sprayer

product_meta.title: Ryka Women's Nell Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: Featuring a heather stretch knit upper, the nell delivers a sock like feel for all day comfort. With a wedge midsole, she gets a little lift and extra cushion.
feature_bullets: Stretch heather knit upper with webbing heel pull.
Soft EVA midsole with lattice design
